title: Beautiful condo conversion with modern Amenities
description: Wonderful opportunity to live in the historic landmark Colannade Building! Built in 1932 as a The Wills Eyes Institute, today is has blossomed into a beautiful condo conversion with modern amenities including a doorman, secured entrance, and a gorgeous atrium that is currently under renovation with a world class designer. This is moderate sized boutique building is home to 115 units. Unit 409 is newly renovated with state of the art finishes. Stainless steel appliances, gorgeous warm chestnut cabinets with built in diamond wine rack and glass bar. onyx granite counters with flecks of gold. Venetian stone backsplash with gilded rope details with an elaborate crystal chandelier over kitchen island. Blonde kitchen floor tiles. Maple hardwood floors in living area and bedroom with nice size closets and windows for plenty of natural light. Custom designer paint throughout. Enter into the master bath with Venetian stone tile with sea glass accents and custom vanity mirror with Frigidaire stackable washer dryer. Building is equipped with a fitness room and storage area in basement. Walking distance to essentially everything Philly has to offer. Subway, bus lines, 76, 95, Center City, Kelly Drive area cafes, music venues, restaurants, fitness centers, boot camps and crossfit. You want it, we got it! This lovely home can come partially furnished with two comfortable leather couches, small dining table and fully stocked kitchen (utensils, pots/pans, etc.) for 50 more a month.

title: WELCOME TO UNIT 15A IN THE FABULOUS ELLINGTON BUILDING!
description:
Welcome to Unit 15A in the fabulous Ellington building! Unit 15A is a light-filled, south facing corner unit in one of the more spacious layouts of the building. High up on the 15th floor, you have views of South Philadelphia as well as the iconic Comcast building! High ceilings and oversized windows make for a comfortable living & dining space. The kitchen has plenty of cabinet and counter space plus stainless steel appliances. Storage is not an issue in this unit - the hall is lined with deep closets for all of your belongings and both bedrooms have ample closet space. The Ellington is a secure, convenient building with a 24-hour concierge, fitness center, meeting & party rooms, and a library. Several parking garages with monthly options are within a block of the front door. No pets. First, last, and security deposit due prior to move-in. $300 non-refundable move-in fee required by the building. All utilities included except cable/internet.

title: UPDATED 1-BEDROOM HOME IN THE SOUGHT-AFTER NEIGHBORHOOD OF FITLER SQUA
description:
Custom Created and Updated 1-bedroom home in the sought-after neighborhood of Fitler Square. This sun-drenched corner home faces south and west and is on the 3rd floor with views of the surrounding neighborhood. Designed with the owners talent as an architect, all of the surfaces, sinks bath, walls emanates a custom feeling unit . Kitchen features stainless steel appliances, gas cook range, built in microwave, dishwasher, and tile floors. The shared washers and dryers are located on the lower level, as well as an additional storage locker . Right out your front door are phenomenal cafes, restaurants and parks, including Fitler Square, The Schuylkill River trail and Markward Park. A very short walk across the South Street Bridge to University City, CHOP, HUP, UPenn and Drexel. Nearby is 30th Street Train Station, Rittenhouse Square, tennis courts, community gardening, dog runs . A couple of my nearby favorite restaurants include Sabrina's, Rowhome Cafe, Rival Brothers Coffee, Cafe Lutecia, Aunt Pants Cafe, Good Karma Coffee, Lou Birds, Pub & Kitchen & Ten Stone. South Square Market & Heirloom Grocery Market. Amazon Locker store @The Plaza at 23Rd & South to spend the evening cooling off with ice cream/FroYo from Igloo or a cold beer from Grace Tavern. Brand New Water Heater And Refrigerator to make life easy. Can be rented furnished or unfurnished.
2531 Lombard St #3S

title: WOW, MODERN TOWNHOUSE FEATURED IN PHILADELPHIA MAGAZINE!
description:
WOW, MODERN TOWNHOUSE FEATURED IN PHILADELPHIA MAGAZINE! Here is a rare opportunity to live in a modern townhouse on a tree-lined, quiet Center City street. This beautifully maintained, eight-year-old home has an open floor plan on the first floor with a magnificent kitchen that leads to an ultra-private backyard with twinkle lights, wood decking, a chalkboard-paint wall, and a one-of-a-kind mural by local artist Kaitlin Chow. The second floor has 2 spacious bedrooms, generous closet space, and a full bath. The entire third floor is a primary suite with a custom paint treatment, 2 oversized closets including a custom closet system, and a full bath with large, glass-enclosed shower and double vanity - a rare find in Center City! Continue to the fourth floor for a roof deck offering views of the city. The finished basement has high ceilings, a laundry area, plenty of storage, and a half bath. This home is full of smart modern touches: video doorbell, dual-zone air conditioning and heating with Nest thermostats, high ceilings, wide stairs, hardwood floors, hardwired smoke detectors and sprinklers, custom blackout blinds, freshly painted walls, and more. 1309 Rodman Street is in the McCall School catchment, and a couple of blocks to Whole Foods, Acme, the Kimmel Center, Seger Park, and the hottest restaurants of Midtown Village and Rittenhouse.

description:
Live at Park Towne Place Apartment Homes in Center City Philadelphia, and you'll be blocks from the center of nightlife in Logan Square and Rittenhouse Square. Unit features modern kitchens, quartz countertops, stainless steel appliances, in-unit washers and dryers, breakfast bars, pendant lighting, tile backsplashes, wood plank flooring throughout, walk-in closets. Stunning city and museum views are offered in a variety of floor plans! Mainstreet Market and Caf , featuring gourmet coffee and tea and much more! Fitness center with Technogym equipment, Queenax boxing gym, yoga/spin studio with indoor/outdoor workout space. It boasts Philadelphia's largest pools, an art studio, fitness center with boxing gym, yoga/spin studio, social lounge with demonstration kitchen, gourmet market and cafe, outdoor lounge with fire pit, 24-hour concierge, 24/7 package acceptance, resident shuttle service to Center City and University City and more. Make Whole Foods as your second kitchen conveniently located just 1 block away. Our apartments are within one mile of several institutions of higher education: Drexel University, Temple University, University of Penn, CHOP, Moore college of Arts, Community College of Philadelphia. You won't find a better building to live with amenities in the Fairmount Area. Park Towne Place includes 948 apartment and penthouse homes within four high-rise towers. The community is nestled between green acres on the Benjamin Franklin Parkway in the heart of Center City Philadelphia's Museum District. Park Town. ** Prices and availability subject to change on a daily basis ** Photos are of model units ** Parking may be available for additional fee **

title: Wonderful one bedroom one bath home with one car garage parking and l
description: Wonderful one bedroom one bath home with one car garage parking and large private outdoor courtyard conveniently located within the Mid Century Modern Society Hill classic called Penn's Landing Square. Designed by the architect Louis Sauer in 1968 it is a full city block of impeccably maintained and planted courtyards with homes of all sizes. This gated community sits in the heart of Society Hill. Cobblestone clad streets, Head house Farmers Market (one half a block away and pretty amazing), Zahav restaurant, Stella Pizza, Malbec and many incredible independent coffee shops all within short walking distance. 9A is perfectly situated at the South West corner of the complex (closest to 2nd & Delancey where there is an additional courtyard entrance) and just off the complex's private in ground pool. This unit is 980 sq ft plus a 162 sq ft private garden. Enter through your own North West facing private gated landscaped courtyard/patio/garden to the front door. There is a generous coat closet on the left and then a wide open living /dining area all with engineered laminate floors. All windows look out on to your private garden. Larger main bedroom with walk in closet all with wall to wall carpeting. Updated full tiled bath with tub.
